detail.content: Research | Radiology                                     Skip to main content                      Patient Care       Faculty & Staff Directory       Events       Careers       Donate                                                                                                                                                                             Radiology                                                                                  Home   About Us   Patient Care   For Healthcare Professionals   Research   Education                                  Home Research            Print  Email               - A + A                                         Research        open/close   CBI                                                                      Research                                                         Our mission in the Department of Radiology at NYU Langone Medical Center is to transform the field of Radiology to improve the lives of people.  Our research division serves that mission by developing, evaluating, and implementing the next generation of imaging techniques and technologies in order to detect disease earlier, guide more effective treatment, and in general help doctors tomorrow to see what is invisible today. In short, we aim to bring to bear the very best new technologies in order to improve the care of patients here in New York and throughout the world.   This mission requires that scientists and engineers be integrated with practicing radiologists and connected to clinicians in a wide range of specialties, in order to understand key unsolved problems and unmet clinical needs, and ultimately to implement solutions with a real impact for clinical medicine.   It also requires radiologists who appreciate how new technical developments can improve their day-to-day practice, and who take the time to work with developers in evaluating the efficacy of new approaches and determining key next steps.   It requires a collaborative environment in which new methods and devices can be evaluated rapidly to improve the care of actual patients.   And it requires coordination with industry to ensure that the best methods, after thorough comparison and evaluation, are adopted not only at our institution but on imaging systems worldwide.   In our department, we have taken pains to create an interdisciplinary environment in which basic scientists and engineers work alongside clinical radiologists and industry scientists in common offices all located under one roof at 660 First Avenue.  Our clinicians see the benefit of new technologies in their practice well before they are available elsewhere, and our scientists and engineers have the satisfaction of seeing their technological advances applied to solve current challenges in medical practice. Meanwhile, we maintain a network of collaborations connecting us to many of the clinical and basic science departments at NYULMC, as well as to a wide range of leading institutions around the world.    Our Center for Advanced Imaging Innovation and Research (CAI2R) lies at the nexus of our collaborative translational research network, bringing the scientists and engineers of our Bernard and Irene Schwartz Center for Biomedical Imaging (CBI) together with radiologists, members of other collaborating departments, and industry scientists as partners in the co-development, rapid evaluation, and robust dissemination of new imaging approaches.  Together, we continue to push the frontiers of MRI, PET, CT, Ultrasound, etc. in order to see what could not be seen before.                                                                                                                   NYU Langone Medical Center       Student Login       Library                 Policies & Disclaimers

NYU Imaging Locations | Radiology                                     Skip to main content                      Patient Care       Faculty & Staff Directory       Events       Careers       Donate                                                                                                                                                                             Radiology                                                                                  Home   About Us   Patient Care   For Healthcare Professionals   Research   Education                                  Home About Us Locations            Print  Email               - A + A                                         About Us      Message from the Chairman   Leadership   Our Physicians     open/close   Our Team   Radiologist Spotlight   Employee Spotlight     open/close   Subspecialties  Abdominal Imaging   Breast Imaging   Cardiac Imaging   Emergency Radiology   Musculoskeletal Section   Neurointerventional Radiology   Neuroradiology   Nuclear Medicine   Pediatric Imaging   Thoracic Imaging   Vascular Interventional Radiology     Radiology News   NYU Langone Radiology Alumni                                                                      NYU Imaging Locations                                                        The NYU Langone Department of Radiology provides a comprehensive range of imaging and interventional services throughout Manhattan as well as Long Island, Queens, Brooklyn, and Westchester. Below is a list of our sites separated by borough. Please click on any link to get further information on the location, hours of operation, and services provided at each imaging center.      View a map of our locations     Manhattan:       NYU Langone Radiology - Faculty Practice Radiology [Kips Bay]       Tisch Hospital NYU Langone Radiology [Kips Bay]       NYU Langone Radiology at 22nd street [Gramercy Park]       NYU Langone Radiology at Center for Biomedical Imaging [Murray Hill]       Center for Musculoskeletal Care [Murray Hill]       Laura Perlmutter Center for Women’s Imaging [Murray Hill]       Perlmutter Cancer Center [Murray Hill]       NYU Langone Radiology at Trinity [Financial District]       NYU Langone Radiology - Gramercy Diagnostic Radiology [Gramercy Park]       Hospital for Joint Diseases [Gramercy Park]       Joan H. Tisch Center for Women’s Health [Upper East Side]     Long Island       NYU Langone Radiology - Next Generation Radiology [Great Neck]       NYU Langone Radiology - Next Generation Radiology [Port Jefferson]       Metropolitan Diagnostic Imaging [Garden City]     Queens       NYU Langone Radiology - Columbus Imaging [Rego Park]       NYU Langone Radiology - Queens Medical Imaging [Forest Hills]     Westchester       NYU Langone Orthopaedics at Westchester [White Plains]     Brooklyn       NYU Langone Radiology - Premier Imaging [Park Slope]     Staten Island       NYU Langone Regional Radiology – Staten Island NY  [Outerbridge]       NYU Langone Regional Radiology – Staten Island NY [Bard Avenue]       NYU Langone Regional Radiology – Staten Island NY [South]                                                                                                                   NYU Langone Medical Center       Student Login       Library                 Policies & Disclaimers

The Department of Radiology | Radiology                                      Skip to main content                      Patient Care       Faculty & Staff Directory       Events       Careers       Donate                                                                                                                                                                             Radiology                                                                                  Home   About Us   Patient Care   For Healthcare Professionals   Research   Education                                  Home            Print  Email               - A + A                                                                                                                                           The Department of Radiology                                                      For over one hundred years, The Department of Radiology at NYU Langone Medical Center has advanced the practice of radiology to serve the healthcare needs of patients and physicians. Today, we offer comprehensive and state-of-the-art imaging examinations and image-guided procedures to support NYU Langone Medical Center, a world-class patient-centered integrated academic medical center that is one of the nation’s premier centers for excellence in healthcare, biomedical research and medical education.                                                                         Research                        Our mission in the Department of Radiology at NYU Langone Medical Center is to transform the field of Radiology to improve the lives of people.       More               Education                            The NYU Langone Department of Radiology takes great pride in training and educating radiologists of all ages and experiences. Our main education goal is to help shape the future leaders of radiology.       More               For Healthcare Professionals                        The NYU Langone Department of Radiology continues to improve its services and imaging in order to better serve of referring physicians and patients.       More                                                                                                                                       NYU Langone Medical Center       Student Login       Library                 Policies & Disclaimers

Breast Imaging | Radiology                                      Skip to main content                      Patient Care       Faculty & Staff Directory       Events       Careers       Donate                                                                                                                                                                             Radiology                                                                                  Home   About Us   Patient Care   For Healthcare Professionals   Research   Education                                  Home About Us Subspecialties Breast Imaging            Print  Email               - A + A                                                                                                                  Breast Imaging       The NYU Langone Breast Imaging provides comprehensive outpatient screening, diagnostic and interventional services for patients at several sites at the NYU Langone Medical Center. These sites include the NYU Langone Clinical Cancer Center, Center for Women’s Imaging, Center for Women’s Health, Gramercy Park Radiology (new), Columbus Radiology, Bellevue and Gouverneur Hospital.   Diagnostic services include high-resolution 3T magnetic resonance imaging (MRI), low-dose digital mammography, ultrasonography, and conventional radiography. Interventional services include Ultrasound, stereotactic, and MRI guided core biopsies, Ultrasound guided fine needle aspirations (FNA), galactography, and needle localizations. Each of our 14 radiologists are fellowship trained in Breast Imaging and practice solely breast imaging.  Our specialty-trained staff is world-renowned in the fields of diagnostic and interventional breast radiology, publishing regularly in prestigious peer-reviewed journals and lecturing at breast and radiology meetings around the world.   We are proud to announce that NYU Langone Clinical Cancer Center and Bellevue have received The American College of Radiology’s (ACR) designation as a “Breast Imaging Center of Excellence”.   This signifies that our Breast Imaging Center provides services to our community at the highest standards of the Radiology profession. The Breast Imaging Center has been given this distinction for two consecutive years. This designation is awarded only if the center has achieved accreditation by the ACR in stereotactic breast biopsy, breast ultrasound and ultrasound guided breast biopsy and by the ACR or an FDA approved state credentialing body in mammography.                                                                             Our Faculty                  The NYU breast imaging section provides state of the art diagnostic and interventional services to the New York community, while also serving as one of the leaders in breast imaging research.         More              Our Services              Learn more about the imaging and interventional services we offer.   Imaging techniques   Image guided procedures   Common breast conditions         More              Research/Education              Learn more about our current research projects and Breast imaging fellowship program.   Breast Imaging Research   Fellowship Education         More                                                                                       NYU Langone Medical Center       Student Login       Library                 Policies & Disclaimers

Education | Radiology                                     Skip to main content                      Patient Care       Faculty & Staff Directory       Events       Careers       Donate                                                                                                                                                                             Radiology                                                                                  Home   About Us   Patient Care   For Healthcare Professionals   Research   Education                                  Home Education            Print  Email               - A + A                                         Education        open/close   Resident Education  Meet Our Residents   Clinical Education   Resident Conferences   Resident Evaluations   Academic Opportunities   Resident Life   Resident Benefits   Application Process   Application and Interview Information   Application and Interview FAQs       open/close   Fellow Education  2014- 2015 Fellows   How to Apply   Contact us   Body MR Imaging   Breast Imaging   Cardiovascular Imaging   Musculoskeletal Radiology   Neurointerventional Radiology   Neuroradiology   PET/CT Imaging   Thoracic and Cardiac Imaging   Vascular and Interventional Radiology       open/close   Continuing Medical Education     open/close   Medical Student Education  Career Advising in Radiology   Course Descriptions   Radiology Student Interest   Research Opportunities   Contact us                                                                        Education                                                        The NYU department of radiology takes great pride in training and educating radiologists of all ages and experiences. From trainees to radiologists in clinical practice, our goal is to provide an up to date, comprehensive and stimulating curriculum that prepares our students for the challenges faced in today’s medical environment. Our main education goal is to help shape the future leaders of radiology.   Residency   The radiology residency program is at the center of the department’s educational mission statement: producing well-rounded, caring physicians who will go on to become leaders in the field of radiology. Our residents benefit from daily readout sessions with the NYU faculty, hands on training for a variety of imaging guided procedures, interactive case conferences, and access to world renowned researchers and academic faculty. View more detailed information on our residency program   Fellowship   Our department offers a total of 10 different fellowship programs.  Fellowship training, considered by some as the most important training a radiologist takes part in during his/her career, is important at NYU. Trainees come from all around the world to train in an environment that emphasizes the importance of diagnostic and interventional skills, teaching others, and producing important, clinical and basic science research that has an impact on how medicine is performed. View more detailed information on our fellowship programs   Continuing Medical Education   As part of a leading academic and clinical institution, the NYU Department of Radiology has been sponsoring exceptional postgraduate CME programs for over 20 years. Programs include live CME conferences and visiting fellowships. CME offerings are held in New York City, throughout the U.S. and abroad. Our core objective is to educate registrants with the most up-to-date imaging techniques and medical knowledge in order to improve diagnoses and patient care, always striving for the perfect balance between practical essentials and advanced imaging techniques, which can be applied in daily clinical practice. View more detailed information on the Radiology CME website   Medical Student Education   The department of radiology provides a variety of educational opportunities for medical students, including general diagnostic and subspecialty electives. View more detailed information on our medical student electives                                                                                                                   NYU Langone Medical Center       Student Login       Library                 Policies & Disclaimers

Breast Imaging | Radiology                                      Skip to main content                      Patient Care       Faculty & Staff Directory       Events       Careers       Donate                                                                                                                                                                             Radiology                                                                                  Home   About Us   Patient Care   For Healthcare Professionals   Research   Education                                  Home About Us Subspecialties Breast Imaging            Print  Email               - A + A                                                                                                                  Breast Imaging       The NYU Langone Breast Imaging provides comprehensive outpatient screening, diagnostic and interventional services for patients at several sites at the NYU Langone Medical Center. These sites include the NYU Langone Clinical Cancer Center, Center for Women’s Imaging, Center for Women’s Health, Gramercy Park Radiology (new), Columbus Radiology, Bellevue and Gouverneur Hospital.   Diagnostic services include high-resolution 3T magnetic resonance imaging (MRI), low-dose digital mammography, ultrasonography, and conventional radiography. Interventional services include Ultrasound, stereotactic, and MRI guided core biopsies, Ultrasound guided fine needle aspirations (FNA), galactography, and needle localizations. Each of our 14 radiologists are fellowship trained in Breast Imaging and practice solely breast imaging.  Our specialty-trained staff is world-renowned in the fields of diagnostic and interventional breast radiology, publishing regularly in prestigious peer-reviewed journals and lecturing at breast and radiology meetings around the world.   We are proud to announce that NYU Langone Clinical Cancer Center and Bellevue have received The American College of Radiology’s (ACR) designation as a “Breast Imaging Center of Excellence”.   This signifies that our Breast Imaging Center provides services to our community at the highest standards of the Radiology profession. The Breast Imaging Center has been given this distinction for two consecutive years. This designation is awarded only if the center has achieved accreditation by the ACR in stereotactic breast biopsy, breast ultrasound and ultrasound guided breast biopsy and by the ACR or an FDA approved state credentialing body in mammography.                                                                             Our Faculty                  The NYU breast imaging section provides state of the art diagnostic and interventional services to the New York community, while also serving as one of the leaders in breast imaging research.         More              Our Services              Learn more about the imaging and interventional services we offer. Education | Radiology                                     Skip to main content                      Patient Care       Faculty & Staff Directory       Events       Careers       Donate                                                                                                                                                                             Radiology                                                                                  Home   About Us   Patient Care   For Healthcare Professionals   Research   Education                                  Home Education            Print  Email               - A + A                                         Education        open/close   Resident Education  Meet Our Residents   Clinical Education   Resident Conferences   Resident Evaluations   Academic Opportunities   Resident Life   Resident Benefits   Application Process   Application and Interview Information   Application and Interview FAQs       open/close   Fellow Education  2014- 2015 Fellows   How to Apply   Contact us   Body MR Imaging   Breast Imaging   Cardiovascular Imaging   Musculoskeletal Radiology   Neurointerventional Radiology   Neuroradiology   PET/CT Imaging   Thoracic and Cardiac Imaging   Vascular and Interventional Radiology       open/close   Continuing Medical Education     open/close   Medical Student Education  Career Advising in Radiology   Course Descriptions   Radiology Student Interest   Research Opportunities   Contact us                                                                        Education                                                        The NYU department of radiology takes great pride in training and educating radiologists of all ages and experiences. From trainees to radiologists in clinical practice, our goal is to provide an up to date, comprehensive and stimulating curriculum that prepares our students for the challenges faced in today’s medical environment. Our main education goal is to help shape the future leaders of radiology.   Residency   The radiology residency program is at the center of the department’s educational mission statement: producing well-rounded, caring physicians who will go on to become leaders in the field of radiology. Our residents benefit from daily readout sessions with the NYU faculty, hands on training for a variety of imaging guided procedures, interactive case conferences, and access to world renowned researchers and academic faculty. View more detailed information on our residency program   Fellowship   Our department offers a total of 10 different fellowship programs.  Fellowship training, considered by some as the most important training a radiologist takes part in during his/her career, is important at NYU. Trainees come from all around the world to train in an environment that emphasizes the importance of diagnostic and interventional skills, teaching others, and producing important, clinical and basic science research that has an impact on how medicine is performed. View more detailed information on our fellowship programs   Continuing Medical Education   As part of a leading academic and clinical institution, the NYU Department of Radiology has been sponsoring exceptional postgraduate CME programs for over 20 years. Programs include live CME conferences and visiting fellowships. CME offerings are held in New York City, throughout the U.S. and abroad. Our core objective is to educate registrants with the most up-to-date imaging techniques and medical knowledge in order to improve diagnoses and patient care, always striving for the perfect balance between practical essentials and advanced imaging techniques, which can be applied in daily clinical practice. View more detailed information on the Radiology CME website   Medical Student Education   The department of radiology provides a variety of educational opportunities for medical students, including general diagnostic and subspecialty electives. View more detailed information on our medical student electives                                                                                                                   NYU Langone Medical Center       Student Login       Library                 Policies & Disclaimers

Research | Radiology                                     Skip to main content                      Patient Care       Faculty & Staff Directory       Events       Careers       Donate                                                                                                                                                                             Radiology                                                                                  Home   About Us   Patient Care   For Healthcare Professionals   Research   Education                                  Home Research            Print  Email               - A + A                                         Research        open/close   CBI                                                                      Research                                                         Our mission in the Department of Radiology at NYU Langone Medical Center is to transform the field of Radiology to improve the lives of people.  Our research division serves that mission by developing, evaluating, and implementing the next generation of imaging techniques and technologies in order to detect disease earlier, guide more effective treatment, and in general help doctors tomorrow to see what is invisible today. In short, we aim to bring to bear the very best new technologies in order to improve the care of patients here in New York and throughout the world.   This mission requires that scientists and engineers be integrated with practicing radiologists and connected to clinicians in a wide range of specialties, in order to understand key unsolved problems and unmet clinical needs, and ultimately to implement solutions with a real impact for clinical medicine.   It also requires radiologists who appreciate how new technical developments can improve their day-to-day practice, and who take the time to work with developers in evaluating the efficacy of new approaches and determining key next steps.   It requires a collaborative environment in which new methods and devices can be evaluated rapidly to improve the care of actual patients.   And it requires coordination with industry to ensure that the best methods, after thorough comparison and evaluation, are adopted not only at our institution but on imaging systems worldwide.   In our department, we have taken pains to create an interdisciplinary environment in which basic scientists and engineers work alongside clinical radiologists and industry scientists in common offices all located under one roof at 660 First Avenue.  Our clinicians see the benefit of new technologies in their practice well before they are available elsewhere, and our scientists and engineers have the satisfaction of seeing their technological advances applied to solve current challenges in medical practice. Meanwhile, we maintain a network of collaborations connecting us to many of the clinical and basic science departments at NYULMC, as well as to a wide range of leading institutions around the world.    Our Center for Advanced Imaging Innovation and Research (CAI2R) lies at the nexus of our collaborative translational research network, bringing the scientists and engineers of our Bernard and Irene Schwartz Center for Biomedical Imaging (CBI) together with radiologists, members of other collaborating departments, and industry scientists as partners in the co-development, rapid evaluation, and robust dissemination of new imaging approaches.  Together, we continue to push the frontiers of MRI, PET, CT, Ultrasound, etc. in order to see what could not be seen before. Tisch Center for Women’s Health [Upper East Side]     Long Island       NYU Langone Radiology - Next Generation Radiology [Great Neck]       NYU Langone Radiology - Next Generation Radiology [Port Jefferson]       Metropolitan Diagnostic Imaging [Garden City]     Queens       NYU Langone Radiology - Columbus Imaging [Rego Park]       NYU Langone Radiology - Queens Medical Imaging [Forest Hills]     Westchester       NYU Langone Orthopaedics at Westchester [White Plains]     Brooklyn       NYU Langone Radiology - Premier Imaging [Park Slope]     Staten Island       NYU Langone Regional Radiology – Staten Island NY  [Outerbridge]       NYU Langone Regional Radiology – Staten Island NY [Bard Avenue]       NYU Langone Regional Radiology – Staten Island NY [South]                                                                                                                   NYU Langone Medical Center       Student Login       Library                 Policies & Disclaimers

The Department of Radiology | Radiology                                      Skip to main content                      Patient Care       Faculty & Staff Directory       Events       Careers       Donate                                                                                                                                                                             Radiology                                                                                  Home   About Us   Patient Care   For Healthcare Professionals   Research   Education                                  Home            Print  Email               - A + A                                                                                                                                           The Department of Radiology                                                      For over one hundred years, The Department of Radiology at NYU Langone Medical Center has advanced the practice of radiology to serve the healthcare needs of patients and physicians. Today, we offer comprehensive and state-of-the-art imaging examinations and image-guided procedures to support NYU Langone Medical Center, a world-class patient-centered integrated academic medical center that is one of the nation’s premier centers for excellence in healthcare, biomedical research and medical education.
